item.title: MartinMark for July 7th
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 1. The Apache Tomcat 5.5 Servlet/JSP Container - Load Balancer HOW-TO 2. [原创] Apache + Tomcat + Load Balancing - ChinaUnix.net 3. Clustering and Load Balancing in Tomcat 5, Part 1 - O’Reilly Media 4. How to test web load balance 5. Fronting Tomcat with Apache or IIS - Best practices 6. The Apache Tomcat Connector - Webserver HowTo IIS HowTo I will try to implement this
